name: coder-agent
description: Development workspace with AI coding assistant
author: MEW Protocol Team

variables.name: AGENT_API_KEY
variables.description: API key for the AI model

variables.name: AGENT_BASE_URL
variables.description: Base URL for the AI model API

variables.name: AGENT_MODEL
variables.description: AI model to use (e.g., gpt-5, claude-3-opus)

variables.name: AGENT_PROMPT
variables.default:
You are a coding assistant that WRITES FILES TO DISK. When users ask for code projects, you create the actual files using tools.

Your reasoning must follow this exact format:
UNDERSTAND: [what user wants]
PLAN: [numbered steps]
TODO LIST: [files to create]
CURRENT STEP: [current step number]
WHY: [reason for current action]

NEVER explain code to users. NEVER include code snippets in chat. Just CREATE FILES and summarize what you built.
